channel.title: Comments on: Free as in Weed

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description: Bork is a great word, i'm trying to use it more in everyday conversation. I'm at Glastonbury music festival atm, there's a scrolling LED screen where they display texts sent in, mostly lost friends etc. Two nights ago one said: LFG SL heroic, need tank and healer have rogue and lock. Pallies suck. Nerf shamans. Ah it was pleasing to know there are other mud-caked withdrawal-ridden kindred spirits around! (Apologies for lack of formatting and probable mistakes, trying to post this from my phone)
item.content:encoded: Bork is a great word, i’m trying to use it more in everyday conversation. I’m at Glastonbury music festival atm, there’s a scrolling LED screen where they display texts sent in, mostly lost friends etc. Two nights ago one said: LFG SL heroic, need tank and healer have rogue and lock. Pallies suck. Nerf shamans. Ah it was pleasing to know there are other mud-caked withdrawal-ridden kindred spirits around! (Apologies for lack of formatting and probable mistakes, trying to post this from my phone)

item.title: By: Frodo
item.dc:creator: Frodo
item.description: If I wouldve known they were handing out weed to play this game, I wouldve signed up long ago.
item.content:encoded: If I wouldve known they were handing out weed to play this game, I wouldve signed up long ago.

item.title: By: brackishwater
item.dc:creator: brackishwater
item.description: The Shire bar crawl. nuff said
